main event: On November 15, 1954, in Augusta, Maine, ten bright objects in a V-formation were observed for 7 minutes, following a straight flight path before appearing to dissolve.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 7 minutes, providing a substantial observation period.
Ten bright objects in a V-formation were observed, indicating a coordinated movement pattern.
The objects were described as circular, resembling grapefruits, and appeared to brighten.
The unidentified objects followed a straight path before seeming to dissolve, suggesting unusual behavior.
The observation location included both civilians and military personnel as witnesses.
sighted object: ten bright objects in a V-formation
